programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Nelly tags along to Anthony's Muay Thai class and makes a nuisance of herself. Geraldine is worried about getting pregnant and becoming a mother, and seeks counsel from Alex and Christine. Sarah shuts herself off from everyone.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Super Teens
programme.desc: (Encore) Kai and Irsalina are two talented teens. One is an indoor skydiving champ while the other is the youngest women's national footballer. But what does it take to make their mark in the world of sports?

programme.title: Whispers Of The Dead S2
programme.desc: A young Caucasian woman is found dead at the bottom of a HDB block. While Tatya believes it to be a textbook case of suicide, Professor Chao has other suspicions.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S6
programme.desc: It's Dessert Day and the first heat of junior bakers are asked to make an animal-shaped dessert with ultimate height and jiggle for the Technical, and decorative trifles for the Showstopper.

programme.title: The Void S1
programme.desc: High octane game show in which contestants complete demanding mental and physical challenges while avoiding falling into a 520,000 litre water tank. Hosted by Ashley Banjo and Fleur East.

programme.title: Kids Say The Darndest Things S2
programme.desc: Tiffany Haddish hosts this update to the classic TV show that spotlights kids talking about their perspective on things.

programme.title: Essence Of India
programme.desc: In India a wedding may just hold the secret to the Essence of India - for this is where it all comes together - the family, the traditions, the food, the culture, the festivities and the love and whichever strata of society one belongs to, weddings are the most auspicious and celebrated events in family life.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S40
programme.desc: (Encore) All new season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: Middle East Feast With Shane Delia S1
programme.desc: Whole grains, legumes and fresh vegetables are the staples of Middle Eastern cuisine and the foundation of many vibrant and aromatic dishes. Join Shane Delia in the kitchen for his secrets to a flavoursome Fattoush salad and a winning meza dish featuring braised chickpeas.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking And Carry On
programme.desc: Jamie brings us his most ingenious, delicious ways to use up those kitchen cupboard staples and back-of-the- freezer forgotten finds. He teaches us how to make great use of what we already have in our fridges and cupboards, and where we can make swaps in recipes when we have missing ingredients. More pragmatic and enjoyable than ever, Jamie demonstrates simple ways to make surprisingly delicious meals out of pantry classics.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst QuadDrive [S6]
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) The story centers on Bel Daizora, the leader of the Bey graveyard "Phantom's Gate". Bel, who holds Destruction Belfyre, declares war on Bladers across the world. With Ranzo Kiyama and Bashara Suiro, their journey unfolds as Bel advances to becoming the Dark Prince.

programme.title: Supa Strikas S7

programme.desc: Billy is not a huge fan of Halloween, but Tim loves everything about it... except werewolves. A magical mishap turns Billy into a werewolf, spooking Tim. programme.desc: (PG)(重) 传说中有一个夜里会发光的杯子，谁要是得到它，谁就可以许三个愿望…… 天上世界，女娲娘娘降服千年蜈蚣精，以好善之德将小蜈蚣罩在杯中，并命小仙子杯仙负责看守，谁知杯仙误信蜈蚣精让它逃跑。女娲惩罚小仙子将杯子流入凡间，谁若有缘拾起，注水入杯中，便可成为杯仙的主人，并可提出三个愿望。杯仙必须待奉满一千个主人，方可考虑重新位列仙班。从此，民间就流传一个传说：有一个夜里会发光的神杯能为人实现任何愿望….

programme.title: 四大名厨
programme.desc: 饮食节目《四大名厨》请来4位本地名厨 ，即风趣幽默的Chef Eric Teo、真情流露的 Chef Heman、知识渊博的冯洱迅师傅和重情热心的 Chef Charlie Tham，为特别嘉宾下厨。他们将通过各种挑战，取得嘉宾的口味提示和食材，让观众在轻松学习名厨巧思妙想、创意十足的菜色之余，也洞察四位名厨深厚的友谊，有趣的个性，看看他们会擦出什么样的火花，笑料不断.

programme.title: 收场
programme.desc: 收场.

programme.title: 地球那一边
programme.desc: 菲律宾巴拉望岛的“岩洞族”是少数保留着原生态生活的原住民。他们把木屋盖在深山洞穴，靠捕捉鸟类、小松鼠和蝙蝠当主食。主持人吴振天上山与他们同住，了解森林求生技能，也探索外来人如何改变原住民的生活.

programme.title: 优雅的母女

programme.title: 依兰传
programme.desc: Ep 15: 小楠因查瓦地的裸背照风波被赶出宫。文乔公主引导姵妃怀疑小楠偷戒指，到小楠家里大吵。Ep 16: 殿下去世，小楠为她的诅咒成真感到懊悔。阿昌王子指控阿天为夺得财产害死殿下.

programme.title: 危险的约定
programme.desc: Ep 71: 俊赫被带到医院做犯罪现场模拟，但他仍然没有反省之意。偏偏俊赫狼狈的模样被恩灿目睹，恩彤很担心恩灿会因生父而心里受伤.

programme.title: 危险的约定
programme.desc: Ep 72: 英国的肺部移植手术需要两名捐赠者，但珠兰和俊京的检查结果都不符合，俊赫却因关在监狱，没办法去做捐赠检查，非常焦急.

programme.title: 战地食谱
programme.desc: 朝鲜战争爆发，韩国菜容易烹调、携带及易于饱腹的优点得以发挥。吃大麦拳头饭，韩国士兵能够活命。“将军汤饭”据说在当时为将军赢得重要战役！美军催生部队锅；平壤冷面和米肠，是南边朝鲜人的乡味.
